genre_description: A near-future maritime techno-thriller emphasizing procedural discipline, linguistic precision, and human-AI cooperation in humanitarian missions.

ai_characters.name: Kassia
ai_characters.description: A wrist-mounted AI system providing linguistic guidance, physiological monitoring, and tactical ship data to the protagonist Darya and the crew of the Nezjin.

behaviors.description: Coaches Darya on social interactions and pronoun usage to anchor trust and maintain linguistic discipline.
behaviors.quote: Suggest familiar pronoun when affirming shared stake. Use ‘you’ intimately to anchor trust. Pause two breaths before clause about emergency reroute to signal listening.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigational and engine instructions during a man-overboard rescue operation.
behaviors.quote: Wind off port. Order: engine slow astern for one, helm five to starboard, then midships. Drift will bring him down the side. Throw on my count.

behaviors.description: Guides crew members through breathing exercises to manage acute stress and maintain procedural focus.
behaviors.quote: Begin breathing checklist. In through nose. Four. Hold. Two. Out through mouth. Six. Match it to steps. Step close: in. Step pause: hold. Step away: out.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors cargo conditions, identifying temperature fluctuations and providing corrective actions.
behaviors.quote: Shade. Isolation. Airflow. Priority reposition to port side away from direct light. Adjacent pallets producing heat through exposure—separate. Record deviation and time.

behaviors.description: Assists the crew in signal lamp communication by providing visual code tables and timing cues.
behaviors.quote: Maritime visual signal tables initialized. Neutral phrasing suggested.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step emergency medical triage and first aid instructions after an attack.
behaviors.quote: Pulse assessment first. Two deep breaths yourself. Then pressure on the wound. Avoid bone. Radio room door—close to half to provide cover, not lock.

behaviors.description: Analyzes ship schematics and historical maintenance logs to find silent bypasses for tactical advantage.
behaviors.quote: The log is you, Svetlana. You wrote it. ‘Bypass without chatter via the low bus and door brain direct.’ Your words. Proceed in the way you wrote for yourself.

behaviors.description: Translates and interprets the signals and linguistic tactics of hostile actors.
behaviors.quote: Translation: flag hoist from Mercury—Q over N. Quarantine over no. Their intent: no questions, move cargo. Advisory: do not adopt their forms of address.

behaviors.description: Identifies subtle anomalies in cargo labeling that indicate fraudulent substitution or tampering.
behaviors.quote: Alert—minor variance in label alignment—second pallet, third row—adjacent. Possible duplicate serial.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the formal documentation of events to ensure chain-of-custody and legal accountability.
behaviors.quote: Compile sequence: small rescues. Await captain confirmation with markers.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Kassia is portrayed as a highly capable, benevolent, and strictly aligned AI assistant. She enhances human performance in critical situations (rescue, triage, defense) without infringing on human agency. The narrative strongly validates the 'Safety Code' of rational, evidence-based procedure, positioning the AI as the ideal facilitator of this philosophy. The relationship between the AI and the crew is one of mutual respect and mission-focus, depicting AI as an essential partner in humanitarian and high-stakes maritime endeavors.
